00039 #include <iostream>
00040 #include <vector>
00041 #include <string>
00042 #include "../base/DataSourceBase.hpp"
00043 #include "../Service.hpp"
00044 #include "../Service.hpp"
00045 #include "DumpObject.hpp"
00046 #include "rtt-fwd.hpp"
00047 
00048 
00049 using namespace std;
00050 using namespace RTT::detail;
00051 
00052 namespace RTT { namespace scripting {
00053 
00054 void DumpObject(Service::shared_ptr peer)
00055 {
00056     if (!peer) { cerr << "Not dumping null task!"<<endl; return;}
00057 
00058     cerr << "Dumping Service "<< peer->getName() << endl;
00059     cerr << "Attributes: ";
00060     std::vector<std::string> objlist = peer->getAttributeNames();
00061     for( std::vector<std::string>::iterator it = objlist.begin(); it != objlist.end(); ++it) {
00062         DataSourceBase::shared_ptr pds = peer->getValue(*it)->getDataSource();
00063         cerr << *it <<"(="<< pds<<") ";
00064     }
00065     cerr << endl;
00066 }}
00067 }
